title: The New Adventures of Maya the Honey Bee
overview: The New Adventures of Maya the Honey Bee centers on the adventures of Maya, a young, restless, adventurous and wondering bee, as well as the way she has to work in an environment full of insects and other critters. Maya is sent by the queen bee to get pollen for her hive. In that task Maya, with his inseparable friend Willi the drone, discovers a new world around him and befriends numerous creatures of the forest like the grasshopper Flip, the spider Tecla, the fly Puck, the beetle Kurt or the mouse Alexander.
